Metadata.title: Brat Generator | Create Brat Text, Fonts, Images, Memes, Album Covers & More
Metadata.description: Brat Generator is the tool for creating all things brat - from text and fonts to images, memes, album covers, and even charli xcx-inspired brat content.

CTA.title: Try Brat Generator Now!
CTA.description: Experience the easiest way to create custom text images. No sign-up required - start designing instantly!

HowToUse.title: How to Use Our Brat Generator
HowToUse.description: Our Brat Generator is designed to be user-friendly and easy to operate. Simply follow these steps to get started:
HowToUse.step_description1: Type the desired text in the input field.
HowToUse.step_description2: Choose your preferred text and background colors using the color pickers.
HowToUse.step_description3: Set the width and height of your image using the sliders or input fields.
HowToUse.step_description4: Modify the border radius and font size to perfect your design.
HowToUse.step_description5: See your changes instantly in the preview pane on the right.
HowToUse.step_description6: Once satisfied, click the "Download Image" button to save your creation.
HowToUse.step_description7: Use the "Reset" button to start over with default settings.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Our Brat Generator?
WhyChooseUs.description: Our Brat Generator offers a range of features that make it easy and fun to create custom images resembling the album cover of Brat by Charli XCX.
WhyChooseUs.feature_description1: Our intuitive interface makes creating custom text images a breeze, even for beginners. You can start designing immediately without any learning curve.
WhyChooseUs.feature_description2: Adjust text, colors, size, and more to create the perfect image for your needs. With a wide range of customization options, you can bring your vision to life exactly as you imagine it.
WhyChooseUs.feature_description3: See your changes in real-time, allowing for quick and easy adjustments. This feature helps you fine-tune your design efficiently without the need for multiple exports.
WhyChooseUs.feature_description4: Generate and download your custom image with just one click. Our fast processing ensures you can get your created image immediately, saving you valuable time.
WhyChooseUs.feature_description5: Start creating immediately without the need for sign-ups or logins. This hassle-free approach allows you to jump right into the creative process without any barriers.
WhyChooseUs.feature_description6: Create as many images as you want, completely free of charge. Our tool is accessible to everyone, allowing unlimited creativity without financial constraints.

FAQs.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Our Brat Generator
FAQs.description: Here are some common questions about our Brat Generator:
FAQs.question1: What file format are the generated images in?
FAQs.answer1: The Brat Generator creates images in PNG format, which offers high quality and transparency support, suitable for various uses including web and print.
FAQs.question2: Is there a limit to how many images I can create?
FAQs.answer2: No, there's no limit. You can create as many images as you want, completely free of charge.
FAQs.question3: Can I use the images I create for commercial purposes?
FAQs.answer3: Yes, the images you create with Brat Generator are yours to use for any purpose, including commercial use.
FAQs.question4: Do I need to create an account to use Brat Generator?
FAQs.answer4: No, you don't need to create an account. You can start using Brat Generator immediately without any sign-up process.
FAQs.question5: What's the maximum image size I can create?
FAQs.answer5: The maximum image size is 1000x1000 pixels. This should be sufficient for most use cases, including social media posts and website graphics.
FAQs.question6: Can I use custom fonts in my text images?
FAQs.answer6: Currently, Brat Generator uses a default font. We're working on adding custom font support in future updates.

Banner.title: Brat Generator
Banner.description: Brat Generator is an online tool that allows users to create custom images resembling the album cover of Brat by Charli XCX.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy - Brat Generator
PrivacyPolicy.description: Privacy Policy for Brat Generator - Learn how we protect your privacy while using our image generation tool.
PrivacyPolicy.content:
# Privacy Policy

**Last updated:** December 15, 2024

## 1. Information We Collect

Brat Generator is designed with privacy in mind. We collect minimal information to provide our service:

- **No Personal Account Required:** You can use our image generator without creating an account
- **Usage Analytics:** We collect anonymous usage statistics to improve our service
- **Technical Data:** Basic technical information like browser type and device information
- **Generated Images:** Images are processed locally in your browser and not stored on our servers

## 2. How We Use Your Information

The limited information we collect is used to:

- Provide and maintain our image generation service
- Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience
- Ensure technical functionality and security
- Comply with legal obligations

## 3. Data Storage and Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information:

- **Local Processing:** Image generation happens in your browser, not on our servers
- **No Image Storage:** We do not store or have access to the images you create
- **Secure Connections:** All data transmission is encrypted using HTTPS
- **Limited Data Retention:** Analytics data is anonymized and retained only as long as necessary

## 4. Third-Party Services

We may use third-party services for:

- **Analytics:** Google Analytics for understanding user behavior (anonymized)
- **Performance Monitoring:** Services to ensure our application runs smoothly
- **Content Delivery:** CDN services to deliver our application efficiently

These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them.

## 5. Cookies and Tracking

We use minimal cookies and tracking technologies:

- **Essential Cookies:** Required for basic functionality
- **Analytics Cookies:** Help us understand how users interact with our service
- **Preference Cookies:** Remember your settings like dark mode preferences

You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

## 6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

- Access information about what data we collect
- Request deletion of any personal information we may have
- Opt-out of analytics tracking
- Update or correct any information
- File a complaint with relevant data protection authorities

## 7. Children's Privacy

Our service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

## 8. International Users

Our service is available globally. If you are accessing our service from outside the United States, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States where our servers are located.

## 9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.

## 10. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

- Email: aaabow74@gmail.com
- Website: Contact form on our website.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service - Brat Generator
TermsOfService.description: Terms of Service for Brat Generator - Read our terms and conditions for using our image generation tool.
TermsOfService.content:
# Terms of Service

**Last updated:** December 15, 2024

## 1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Brat Generator ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

## 2. Description of Service

Brat Generator is a web-based image generation tool that allows users to create custom images inspired by the Brat aesthetic. The service includes:

- Text-to-image generation with Brat-style aesthetics
- Customizable text, colors, and effects
- Instant download of generated images
- Educational blog content about design and creativity

## 3. User Responsibilities

As a user of our service, you agree to:

- Use the service only for lawful purposes
- Not create content that is offensive, harmful, or violates others' rights
- Not attempt to reverse engineer or copy our technology
- Not use the service to create misleading or deceptive content
- Respect intellectual property rights of others
- Not overload our servers with excessive requests

## 4. Intellectual Property Rights

### Your Content

You retain full ownership of the images you create using our service. We do not claim any rights to your generated content.

### Our Service

The Brat Generator platform, including its design, functionality, and underlying technology, is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our platform without permission.

### Inspiration and Fair Use

Our service is inspired by the Brat aesthetic popularized by Charli XCX's album. We believe our use falls under fair use for educational and transformative purposes. Users should be aware of potential trademark considerations when using generated images commercially.

## 5. Content Guidelines

When using our service, you may not create content that:

- Violates any laws or regulations
- Infringes on others' intellectual property rights
- Contains hate speech, harassment, or discriminatory content
- Promotes violence or illegal activities
- Contains explicit or inappropriate material
- Impersonates others or spreads misinformation

## 6. Service Availability

We strive to maintain high availability of our service, but we cannot guarantee uninterrupted access. The service may be temporarily unavailable due to:

- Scheduled maintenance
- Technical difficulties
- Server overload
- Force majeure events

## 7. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Brat Generator and its operators shall not be liable for:

- Any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
- Loss of profits, data, or business opportunities
- Damages resulting from use or inability to use the service
- Content created by users of the service
- Third-party actions or content

## 8. Privacy and Data Protection

Your privacy is important to us. Our data collection and use practices are detailed in our Privacy Policy. By using our service, you also agree to our Privacy Policy.

## 9. Modifications to Service and Terms

We reserve the right to:

- Modify or discontinue the service at any time
- Update these terms of service
- Change pricing or introduce new features
- Implement new usage restrictions if necessary

Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.

## 10. Termination

We may terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.

## 11. Governing Law

These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these terms or use of the service shall be resolved in the appropriate courts.

## 12. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

- Email: aaabow74@gmail.com
- Website: Contact form on our website.
